0.title: Website observation
0.text: Know right away if your website is offline! Reliable monitoring saves you money by alerting you before any major problems arise.

1.title: Monitoring pings
1.text: Utilize one of the instruments that administrators use the most frequently to verify the availability of network devices.

2.title: Port surveillance
2.text: Is email service still available? What about the crucial database server, for instance? Let's verify! Track any specified service that is active on any port.

3.title: Keyword monitoring
3.text: Check the presence of the specific text in the content of the site by crawling it whenever you want.

4.title: Provide updates on incidents
4.text: To the subscribers of your Status page, send out status updates through email or other services you support.

5.title: Response periods
5.text: View your response times as a graph to identify performance blips

6.title: Don't let downtime get you down
6.text: There are times when things go wrong. Be informed! Even the strongest among us have downtime. However, it's crucial to be aware of it before clients are impacted!

7.title: Keeping your customers in the know
7.text: Using status pages, you can inform your consumers about incidents. Customers should be informed of scheduled interruptions. Show them how you are thriving to provide a 100% online service.
